## PermitRequestMessage type

EIP-2612 token permit message for gasless transaction

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PermitRequestMessage = {
  to: string;
  owner: string;
  spender: string;
  value: number | string;
  nonce: number | string;
  deadline: number | string;
  v: number;
  r: string;
  s: string;
};
```
